knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
cor(data)
```

```{r}
#row names
names<-row.names(data)
names
```


```{r}
# column names
names(data)
```


```{r}
# means
apply(data,2,mean)
```
```{r}
#variances
apply(data,2,var)
```


# distance matrix
```{r}
dist.eucl <-dist(data.scaled, method = "euclidean")
round(as.matrix(dist(data.scaled, method = "euclidean")))

```

```{r}
library(factoextra)
fviz_dist(dist.eucl)
```

```{r}
library(corrplot)
corrplot(cor(data.scaled), method ="pie")
```
```{r}
corrplot(cor(data.scaled), method ="number")
```

```{r}
library("gplots")
heatmap.2(as.matrix(data.scaled),scale = "none",symmetric =T)
```
